references.paper_title: Contrastive learning for unpaired image-to-image translation
references.reason: This paper introduces contrastive learning for unpaired image-to-image translation, a technique that is central to the methodology of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Image-to-image translation with conditional adversarial networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the concept of using conditional adversarial networks for image-to-image translation, which is a foundational technique used in this paper.

references.paper_title: The unreasonable effectiveness of deep features as a perceptual metric
references.reason: This paper introduces LPIPS, a perceptual metric used to evaluate the quality of the generated images, which is a key evaluation metric used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Gans trained by a two time-scale update rule converge to a local nash equilibrium
references.reason: This paper provides the theoretical foundation for training GANs using a two time-scale update rule, which is a crucial component of the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Rethinking atrous convolution for semantic image segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduces a technique for semantic image segmentation using atrous convolutions, which is used in evaluating the downstream task performance in the paper.
